text: Notes: you have to structrue each project josn files by following following rules:
1) 'id' is for url querty selector, and will be shown in the url address, could be int or string.
1.1) Normally, id should be unique. Eventhough our system handles duplicated (and missing) id by assign them new id from json's filename and hash
2) For projects that do not want password protection, just set password = '' or 'no'
3) Projects have indexOrder 0-9 will be shown as featured project card on the home page
4) Projects that have negative indexOrder numbers will be hidden from the list (only accessable by it's URL)
4.1) indexOrder could be set redundant. Duplicated order number will be sort by id and other factors (generally randomly)
